LanguageData.TM_SkeletalFaction.label: Skeletal
LanguageData.TM_SkeletalFaction.description: Skeletons and undead raised by arcane power.
LanguageData.TM_ElementalFaction.label: Elemental
LanguageData.TM_ElementalFaction.description: Elemental spirits summoned from their planes of power.
LanguageData.TM_SummonedFaction.label: Summoned being
LanguageData.TM_SummonedFaction.description: Beings summoned from other dimensions or planes of existence using arcane power.
